summary: The contact owns a 2020 Lance Camper Trailer. The contact received notification of NHTSA campaign number: 20E071000 (Equipment) however, the part to do the recall repair was not yet available. The contact stated that the manufacturer had exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair. The manufacturer was notified of the issue. The contact had not experienced a failure. Parts distribution disconnect.

The contact owns a 2020 Lance Camper Travel Trailer. The contact received notification of NHTSA campaign number 20E071000 (Equipment) however, the part to do the recall repair was not yet available. The local dealer and manufacturer were contacted, and it was confirmed that the part was not yet available. The contact stated that the manufacturer had exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair. The contact had not experienced the failure. Parts distribution disconnect.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2020 LANCE TRAVEL TRAILER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 20E071000 (EQUIPMENT) HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE RECALL REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO LA MESA RV CENTER DAVIS - RV SERVICES ONLY (5200 CHILES RD, DAVIS, CA 95618, (530)747-8473) WHERE IT WAS CONFIRMED THAT THE PART WAS NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
DOMETIC 3 BURNER STOVE.  MANUFACTURER IS NON COMMUNICATIVE ABOUT ISSUE OR FIX.  REPEATED ATTEMPTS TO GET INFORMATION FAILED.
